greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riordan array (c(x^2)/sqrt(1-4x^2),xc(x^2)), c(x) the g.f. of A000108.
comment: Row sums are A058622(n+1). Diagonal sums are A001791(n+1), with interpolated zeros. Inverse is A117179.

De-aerated and rows reversed, this matrix apparently becomes A014462. The nonzero antidiagonals are embedded in several entries and apparently contain partial sums of previous nonzero antidiagonals. - _Tom Copeland_, May 30 2017
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 01 2006
